options.content: MTM - MDS Traffic Monitoring - Locations ($location)

targets.query: select count(last) from (SELECT last("switchname") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),location) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) from (SELECT last("switchname") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT switchname as "Switch Name", location as "Location",description as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", port_down_reason as "Down Reason", oper_speed as "Speed (G)", pc as "Member of Port-Channel", pwwn as "PWWN" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport order by time desc limit 1
select count(last) from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter
select count(last) from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" = '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select count(last) AS "Up" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Down" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_state = 'down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Admin Down" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'Administratively down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Link failure or not-connected" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'Link failure or not-connected') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'SFP not present') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Error disabled" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" =~ /Error disabled/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "32G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 32) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "2G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 2) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "TF" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'TF') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "F" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'F') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "TE" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'TE') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT switchname as "Switch Name", sys_ver as "NX-OS Version", sys_uptime as "Systerm Uptime", kernel_uptime as "Kernel Uptime", chassis_id as "Switch Type", cpu_kernel as "CPU Util - Kernel", cpu_user as "CPU Util - User", ("mem_used")/("mem_total")*100 as "Memory Util", response_time as "NXAPI Response Time" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,location order by time desc limit 1

select sum("RX Traffic") as "Total RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))*8/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and pc != '' and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("TX Traffic") as "Total TX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))*8/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and pc != '' and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TxWait" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(txwait))*2.5/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,switch,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(crc))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select top("mean",switchport,switch,10) as "RX % Utilization" from (select mean(percent_util) from (SELECT ((non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed)*1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]))*100  as "percent_util" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switchport,switch,10) as "TX % Utilization" from (select mean(percent_util) from (SELECT ((non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed)*1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]))*100  as "percent_util" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "TxWait" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(txwait))*2.5/(elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) * 1000000) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter  group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "CRC" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from  (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total FEC Corrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_corrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total FEC Uncorrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_uncorrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Tx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Rx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,switch,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "FEC Corrected" from(select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_corrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "FEC Uncorrected" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from  (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_uncorrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Tx B2B Transition to 0" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Rx B2B Transition to 0" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,switch,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("last",switch,switchport,10) as "SFP Temperature" from (SELECT last(sfp_temperature) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switch,switchport,10) as "SFP Temperature" from (SELECT last(sfp_temperature) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switch,switchport,10) as "SFP Rx Power" from (SELECT last(sfp_rx_pwr) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down' and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switch,switchport,10) as "SFP Tx Power" from (SELECT last(sfp_tx_pwr) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down' and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Timeout Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(timeout_discards))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Rx Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Tx Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total ITW" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(itw))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Timeout Discards" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(timeout_discards))/(elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Rx Discard" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "TX Discard" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Invalid Transmission Words" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from  (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(itw))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Link Failure" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(link_failures))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Signal Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(signal_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Sync Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(sync_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total RX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total RX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Link Failure" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from  (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(link_failures))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Signal Loss" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(signal_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "Sync Loss" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(sync_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "RX LR" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "TX LR" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "RX LRR" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

panels.title: Top 10 Ports - RX Link Reset Response

targets.query: select top("mean",switch,switchport,10) as "TX LRR" from (select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) from  (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switch,switchport) where $timeFilter

panels.title: Top 10 Ports - TX Link Reset Response

list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=location where $timeFilter

list.name: num_locations
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WITH KEY=location

list.name: num_switches
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WITH KEY=switch
